name: Scendo
description:
How to Play:

Move: W, A, S, D keyboard keys. 

On-Screen Buttons: You mouse to click on-screen buttons

To Battle: Move through the blue flowers, or find Livar and interact with him.

To Interact: Press space when prompted on screen to talk to other characters, or to read signs throughout the world.

Scendo is a student made, turn-based rpg made by Ian Chapman (101248866), and Tyler Miles (101251005) for George Brown College, Fall 2021.

External resources used in game:

Tape Recorder on title screen

Encounter scene background

Serene Village Tileset used in Overworld

Button and Panel UI

Leaf Blast and Convalesce attack animation texture

Slap animation texture

Scratch animation texture

Bubble Blast animation texture

Flamethrower and opponent Convalesce animation texture

Scendo sprites (except for Mourntooth and enemy Mourntooth

All music heard in game

All other overworld character sprites, encounter scene character sprites, battle animations, and Overworld encounter sound effects, encounter scene sound effects, and source code originally created by Ian Chapman and Tyler Miles.
